<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/freight/{freightReference}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update freight and set the shipment price and expenses for a specific shipment. If "final" the carrier settlement will be confirmed.
